Code: “N-H-C+2,5*(A+ABS(0-A))/2 STO G”       Anion gap with correction based on Albumine

Comment: 4=Acute Respiratory Acidosis and Chronic Respiratory Acidosis
8=Metabolic Acidosis with Anion Gap + Acidosis without Anion
9=Metabolic Acidosis with Anion Gap + Metabolic Acidosis

Code: “CMP R AC OR CMP M AL OR NORMAL”
Comment: 20=Normal OR Compensated Respiratory Acidosis OR Compensated

Code: “CMP R AL OR CMP M AC OR NORMAL”
Comment: 21=Normal OR Compensated Respiratory Alcalosis OR Compensated
if acute respiratory acidosis over chronic respiratory
if chronic respiratory acidosis with compensation
Else Acute respiratory acidosis without compensation
Else Metabolic acidosis with good compensation
if chronic respiratory alcalosis with compensation
if acute respiratory alcalosis without compensation
Else Respiratory Alcalosis with partial compensation
if metabolic alcalosis with respiratory acidosis
if metabolic alcalosis with respiratory alcalosis
